title: Riot Please Fix Yo Server
body: So, i get on today, all hyped cause i bought Jhin and so i wanted to play a ranked. I go in Que find a match and im set. But see i could not reconnect to the loading screen at all, it just said check your internet connection. Now inb4 anyone says oh firewall blocked or something, no it didn't, nothing blocked it the client is fine. So the course of me not being able to connect back, the client said i was online for some reason even though i was stuck in the abandoned game menu. Finally it stopped after 20 painful minutes, i thought it was a client error and i thought it wouldn't happen again, so as im a die hard league fan i go again, same thing happens and i was not happy... so i wait another 20 minutes to come back and find me getting a time Que... Riot i wait 40 painful minutes and then you give me 20 min time Que... Please riot fix your servers ...

replies.body:
Hey SP Nighthero,

There are some other steps besides adding exceptions in your firewall that you can try. Please visit the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and perform all the steps listed. Try playing in a Custom match first to test it so you don't incur penalties. Let me know if anything helps.

-DTN
Checked everything, could not find a solution, its weird, this morning i had a normal game...
